text: rupert_giles This is madness ! What can you have been thinking ? You are the Slayer ! Lives depend upon you ! I make allowances for your youth , but I expect a certain amount of responsibility , and instead of which you enslave yourself to this , this ... Cult ?

rupert_giles Quite . Spontaneous human combustion is , is rare , and , and scientifically unexplainable , but there have been cases for hundreds of years . Usually all that 's left is a pile of ashes .
willow_rosenberg That 's all that would have been left if it had n't been for Buffy .

rupert_giles Uh , rage . In most cases the person who combusted was , was terribly angry or , or upset .
